about_the_game:
Subway Outbreak is a side-scrolling base defense strategy pixel game. Play the role of the survivor in the metro station and your goal will be to defend and rebuild your station from the hoard of mutants that want to kill you.

What to do

There's a multitude of tasks to undertake: constructing defenses, enhancing these fortifications for greater resilience and more efficient protection, launching assaults on mutant nests to claim new territory, collecting food from mushrooms and resources from crates.

Goal

To achieve victory, your goal is to endure approximately 30 days in the game, successfully defending your base from various assaults. Initially, you will face minor groups of mutants, but as the game progresses, you'll confront an overwhelming swarm of mutants. Moreover if you perishes or if the power generator which is crucial to the base's operation gets destroyed you will lose the game.

content_descriptors.notes: The characters in the game will experience death so this can be when you get attack by mutants or explosions.
